segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any blue shirts ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not familiar with American size .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Let me see . I think you'd wear a size 8 . This shirt is size 8 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's pretty . May I try it on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . The fitting room is over there .
segments.speaker: S1
